# 02LUKA Memory Repository

This repository stores automated memory entries created by the AI/OP-001 v3 protocol.

## Structure

- `{agent}/{scope}/` - Memory entries organized by agent and scope
- Each file contains markdown-formatted memory content
- Git history provides complete audit trail
